SA10nagvigvu:2: sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaś cet /
SA10nagvigvu:3: tvadvacanam asvabhāvaṃ na nivartayitum svabhāvam alaṃ // NagVv_1 //
SA10nagvigvu:4: yadi sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ hetau pratyayeṣu ca hetupratyayasāmagrāñ ca pṛthak ca yatra sarvatra svabhāvo na vidyata iti kṛtvā śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:7: na pratyayeṣu samagreṣu na hetupratyayeṣu samagreṣu na hetupratyayasāmagrāṃ na hetupratyayavinirmuktaḥ pṛthag eva vā /
SA10nagvigvu:8: yasmād atra svabhāvo nāsti tasmān niḥsvabhāvo 'ṅkuraḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:10: yathā cāyam aṅkuro niḥsvabhāvo niḥsvabhāvāc ca śūnyaḥ tathā sarvabhāvā niḥsvabhāvatvāc chūnya iti /
SA10nagvigvu:13: yady evaṃ tavāpi vacanaṃ yady etac chūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tad api śūnyaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:14: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tad api hetau nāsti /
SA10nagvigvu:15: mahābhūteṣu saṃprayukteṣu viprayukteṣu vā pratyayeṣu nāsti /
SA10nagvigvu:26: nāsatībhir atbhiḥ śakyaṃ kledayitum evam asattā vacanena śakyaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ kartuṃ na śakyaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvo nivartayituṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:27: tatra yad uktaṃ sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ pratiṣidhaḥ sarvatra bhāvasvabhāvo vinivartata iti / tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:29: atha sasvabhāvam etad vākyaṃ pūrvā hata pratijñā te /
SA10nagvigvu:30: vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ // NagVv_2 //
SA10nagvigvu:31: athāpi manyase mā bhūd eṣa doṣa iti sasvabhāvam etad vākyaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:33: tasmād anena sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvo vinivarta iti //
SA10nagvigvu:35: yā hi te pratijñā śūnyāḥ svabhāvā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:38: kasmāt sarvabhāveṣu tvadvacanam aśūnyaṃ yenāśūnyatvāt sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:41: hanta cet punaḥ śūnyāḥ sarvahhāvās tena tvadvacanaṃ śūnyam sarvabhāvāntargatatvāt tvadvacanasya /
SA10nagvigvu:43: tatra yaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāva iti anupapannaḥ / 1 /
SA10nagvigvu:45: upapannaś cet punaḥ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti pratiṣedhas tena tvadvacanaśūnyatvād anena pratiṣedho anupapannaḥ / 2 /
SA10nagvigvu:47: atha śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvās tvadvacanañ cāśūnyaḥ yena pratiṣedhas tena tvadvacanaṃ sarvatrāsaṃgṛhītaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:50: sarvatra cet punaḥ gṛhītaṃ tvadvacanaṃ sarvabhāvāś ca śūnyāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:51: tena tad api śūnyaṃ śūnyatvād anena nāsti pratiṣedhaḥ / 4 /
SA10nagvigvu:53: atha śūnyam asti vānena pratiṣedhaḥ śūnyaḥ sarvabhāvā iti tena śūnyāpi sarvabhāvāḥ kāryakriyāsamarthā samarthabhaveyuḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:56: atha śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ na ca kāryaṃ kriyāsamarthaṃ bhavaṃti mā bhūt dṛṣṭāntavirodha iti kṛtvā śūnyena tvadvacanena sarvabhāvāsvabhāvo pratiṣedho nopapanna iti / 6 /
SA10nagvigvu:60: yena hi viśeṣahetunā kiñcit śūnyaṃ kiñcid aśūnyaṃ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:62: tatra yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:65: mā śabdavad ity etat syāt te buddhir na caitad upapannam /
SA10nagvigvu:66: śabdenātra satā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasya // NagVv_3 //
SA10nagvigvu:67: syāt te buddhiḥ yathā nāma kaścit brūyāt mā śabdaṃ kārṣīr mā śabdaṃ kārṣīr iti /
SA10nagvigvu:70: śūnyena vacanena sarvatā sarvabhāvasvabhāvavyāvartanaṃ kriyata iti /
SA10nagvigvu:73: satā hy atra śabdena hy atra bhaviṣyataḥ śabdasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:74: na punar iha bhavataḥ satā vacanena sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:75: tava hi matena vacanam apy asat /
SA10nagvigvu:77: tasmād ayaṃ mā śabdavad iti viṣayopanyāso 'sann iti //
SA10nagvigvu:80: pratipratiṣedhyo 'py evam iti mataṃ bhavet tad asad eva /
SA10nagvigvu:81: evaṃ tava pratijña lakṣaṇato dūṣyate na mama // NagVv_4 //
SA10nagvigvu:82: syāt te buddhiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyo 'py anenaiva kalpenānupapannaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:87: kasmāt tava ca hi pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptam etan na mama bhavān iha bravīti /
SA10nagvigvu:91: tatra yad uktaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyo 'py evaṃ matam iti /
SA10nagvigvu:95: pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvad yady upalabhya vinivartayasi bhāvān /
SA10nagvigvu:96: tan nāsti pratyakṣaṃ bhāvā yenopalabhyante // NagVv_5 //
SA10nagvigvu:97: yadi pratyakṣataḥ sarvabhāvān upalabhya bhavān nivartayati śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:99: kasmāt pratyakṣam api hi pramāṇaṃ svabhāvāntargatatvāt śūnyaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:100: yo 'pi sarvabhāvān upalabhate so 'pi śūnyas tasmāt pratyakṣeṇa pramāṇena nopalambhabhāvo anupalabdhasya ca pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ śūnyaḥ sarvabhāvā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:104: anumānenāgamenopānena vā sarvabhāvān upalabhya sarvabhāvavyāvartanaṃ kriyata iti //
SA10nagvigvu:108: anumānam apy upamānāgamāś ca pratyakṣeṇa pramāṇena pratyuktāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:109: yathā hi pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt /
SA10nagvigvu:113: te 'pi śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt* anumānopamānāgamaiś ca yo 'pi bhāvān upalabhate so 'pi śūnyaḥ tasmāt bbāvānām upalambhābhāvo 'nupalabdhānāñ ca svabhāvapratiṣedhānupapattiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:114: tatra yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti / tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:118: kuśalaṃ janasvabhāvaṃ śeṣeṣv apy eṣa viniyogaḥ // NagVv_7 //
SA10nagvigvu:119: iha dharmāvasthāvido manyante kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām ekonaviṃśaṃ śataṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:122: sparśasya manasikārasya chandasyādhimokṣasya vīryasya smṛteḥ samādheḥ prajñāyā upekṣāyāḥ prayogasya saṃprayogasya prāpto 'dhyāśayasya prativirateḥ vyavasāyā autsukyasya /
SA10nagvigvu:123: unmūrdhe utsāhasya avyārtyasya vasitāyāḥ pratipatter avipratīsārasya dhṛter adhyavasāyasya /
SA10nagvigvu:132: hāsasya vācaḥ viṣpandanāyāḥ siddhasyāprasādasya aprasrabdheḥ vyavahāratāyaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:135: apradakṣiṇagrāhasya saṃepasya saṃvarāṇāṃ pariśuddher adhyāśayasya rūpasyeti /
SA10nagvigvu:138: amada alobha adoṣa amoha asarvat* apratiniḥsargaḥ vibhava apatrayā apariśucchadanaṃ mānanaṃ kāruṇyaṃ maitrī adīnatādaritamari.(d)
SA10nagvigvu:139: ha + + nupanāhaḥ alī cetaso paryādānaṃ kṣāntiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:143: nairyāṇikatāsarvajñatāsaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ ity ekonaviṃśaṃ śataṃ kuśalānāṃ kuśalaḥ svabhāvaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:161: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnya iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:164: nairyāṇikasvabhāvo dharmo nairyāṇikāś ca ye teṣāṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:166: iha ca dharmo 'vasthoktānāṃ nairyāṇikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇikaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:172: evaṃ śeṣāṇāṃ tad yasmād evam anekaprakāro dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:176: yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāva ity evaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:177: nāmāpi bhavet naivaṃ nāmāpi nirvastukan nāsti // NagVv_9 //
SA10nagvigvu:178: yadi ca dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ svabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvāc cāśūnyaḥ sarvabhāvāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:179: tatra yad uktaṃ niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyā iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:182: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate tasmāt /
SA10nagvigvu:183: dharmair vinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasyāsti tad yuktam upadeṣṭum // NagVv_10 //
SA10nagvigvu:184: atha manyase mā bhūd avastukaṃ nāmeti kṛtvāsti svabhāvaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:186: evaṃ dharmaśūnyatā ca niḥsvabhāvatvād dharmāṇāṃ siddhā bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagvigvu:189: evaṃ kasyedānīṃ sa svabhāvo dharmavinirmuktasyārthasya tad yuktam upadeṣṭum arthaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:190: sa ca nopadiṣṭas tasmād yā kalpanāsti svabhāvo na punar dharmāṇām iti sā hīnā //
SA10nagvigvu:192: sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ity ayaṃ yasmāt /
SA10nagvigvu:193: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho yaṃ sataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt // NagVv_11 //
SA10nagvigvu:194: iha ca sato 'rthasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate nāmataḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:198: evam eva nasti svabhāvo dharmāṇām iti /
SA10nagvigvu:201: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyā iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:204: atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kin na pratiṣidhyate tvayānena /
SA10nagvigvu:205: vacanena rte vacanāt pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyate hy asataḥ // NagVv_12 //
SA10nagvigvu:206: nāsty eva svabhāvā ity anena vacanena niḥsvabhāvā bhāvā iti kiṃ bhavatā pratiṣidhyate /
SA10nagvigvu:207: asato hi vacād vinā siddhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:212: evaṃ mithyāḥ grāhaḥ syāt te pratiṣidhyate hy asataḥ // NagVv_13 //
SA10nagvigvu:213: syāt te buddhiḥ yathā bālānāṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ mithyājalam iti grāho bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:214: nanu nirjalā sā mṛgatṛṣṇeti tatra paṇḍitajātīyena puruṣeṇocyate /
SA10nagvigvu:215: tasya mithyāgrāhasya vinivartanārtham evan niḥsvabhāveṣu yaḥ svabhāvo grāhaḥ satvānāṃ tasya vyāvartanārthan niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā ity ucyata iti //
SA10nagvigvu:218: nanv evaṃ saty asti grāho grāhyañ ca tadgrahītā ca /
SA10nagvigvu:219: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣedhā ceti ṣaṭkaṃ tat // NagVv_14 //
SA10nagvigvu:220: yady evaṃ nanv evaṃ saty asti tāvat satvānāṃ mithyāgrāhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:222: asti pratiṣedhaḥ tasyāpi mithyāgrāhasyāsti pratiṣedhyaṃ yad idaṃ mithyāgrāhyaṃ nāma /
SA10nagvigvu:223: santi pratiṣedhāro yuṣmadādayo 'sya mithyāgrāhasyeti siddhaṃ ṣaṭkam /
SA10nagvigvu:225: yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:226: atha naivāsti grāho na ca grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāraḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:227: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣedhāro 'py ata na santi // NagVv_15 //
SA10nagvigvu:228: atha mā bhūd eṣa doṣa iti kṛtvā naiva grāho 'sti naiva grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāra iti /
SA10nagvigvu:229: evaṃ sati yo 'sau grāhasya pratiṣedhaḥ niḥsvahhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:230: so 'pi nāsti pratiṣedhyam api nāsti pratiṣedhāro 'pi na santi /
SA10nagvigvu:232: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣedhārāaś ca yady uta na santi /
SA10nagvigvu:233: siddhā hi sarvabhāvā yeṣām evaṃ svabhāvaś ca // NagVv_16 //
SA10nagvigvu:234: yadi ca na pratiṣedho na pratiṣedhyaṃ na pratiṣeddhāraḥ santy apratisiddhāḥ sarvabhāvā asti ca sarvabhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:236: hetoḥ svato na siddhiḥ naiḥsvābhāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:237: nirhetukasya siddhir na copapannāsya te 'rthasya // NagVv_17 //
SA10nagvigvu:238: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā ity etasmin arthe te hetor asiddhiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:239: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvād dhi sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvān na tato hetuḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:240: asati hetau nirhetukasyārthasya śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti kuta eva prasiddhiḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:241: tatra yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:243: yadi cāhetoḥ siddhiḥ svabhāvavinivartanasya te bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:245: atha manyase nairhetukī siddhiḥ niḥsvabhāvatvasya bhāvānām iti /
SA10nagvigvu:249: atha hetor astitvaṃ bhāvānaiḥsvābhāvyam ity anupapannam /
SA10nagvigvu:250: loko naiḥsvabhāvyān na hi kaścana vidyate bhāvaḥ // NagVv_19 //
SA10nagvigvu:254: na hi loke niḥsvabhāvaḥ kaścid bhāvo 'sti //
SA10nagvigvu:256: pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyam iti na copapannam /
SA10nagvigvu:257: yaś cānupapanno yugapac ca yataḥ svabhāvo 'san // NagVv_20 //
SA10nagvigvu:258: iha pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāc ca pratiṣedhyaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:261: atha paścāt pratiṣedhaḥ pūrvaṃ pratiṣedhyam iti ca nopapannaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:262: siddhe hi pratiṣedhye kiṃ pratiṣedhaḥ karoti /
SA10nagvigvu:263: atha yugapatpratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhye tathāpi na pratiṣedhyaḥ pratiṣedhyasyārthasya kāraṇaṃ prati na pratiṣedhyaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:265: yathā yugapadutpannayor goviṣāṇayoḥ naiva dakṣiṇaṃ savyasya kāraṇaṃ savyaṃ vā dakṣiṇasya gāraṇaṃ bhavatīti /
SA10nagvigvu:266: tatra yad uktaṃ niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:269: sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaś cet /
SA10nagvigvu:270: tvadvacanam asvabhāvaṃ na nivartayituṃ svabhāvam alam iti / [1]
SA10nagvigvu:273: nanu śūnyatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhāvānām asvabhāvatvāt // NagVv_21 //
SA10nagvigvu:274: yadi madvaco hetau nāsti mahābhūteṣu saṃprayukteṣu viprayukteṣu vā pratyayeṣu nāsti /
SA10nagvigvu:275: uraḥkaṇthojihvādantatālunāsikamūrdhaprabhṛtiṣu ya + + sāmagryām asti heṃpratyayasāmagrīṃ vinirmuktaṃ pṛthag vāsti /
SA10nagvigvu:278: nanu śūnyatvaṃ siddhaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvād asya madīyavacasaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:281: yad bhavatoktaṃ tvadīyavacasaḥ śūnyatvāt śūnyatā sarvabhāvānāṃ nopapadyata iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:284: yaś ca pratītya bhāvānāṃ śūnyateti taṃ brū + + /
SA10nagvigvu:285: yas tu pratītyabhāvo bhavati hi tasyāsvabhāvatvaṃ // NagVv_22 //
SA10nagvigvu:286_0: śūnyatārthañ ca bhavān bhāvānām anavasamya śūnyatārtham ajñātvā pravṛtti upālambhaṃ
SA10nagvigvu:286_1: vaktuṃ tvadvacanasya śūnyatvāt tvadvacanasya niḥsvabhāvatvād evaṃ tvadvacanena niḥsvabhāvena
SA10nagvigvu:287: iha hi yaḥ pratītya bhavānāṃ bhāvaḥ sā śūnyatā /
SA10nagvigvu:289: ye hi pratītyasamutpānnā bhāvās te sa sasvabhāvā bhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:295: tasmān niḥsvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāc chūnyā ity abhidhīyante /
SA10nagvigvu:297: pratītyasamutpannatvān niḥsvabhāvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyam ity upapannaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:300: rathapaṭaghaṭādayaḥ sveṣu sveṣu kāryeṣu kāṣṭhāhaṇamṛttikaharaṇamadhūdakapayasāṃ dhāraṇā śītavātātapaparitrāṇaprabhṛtiṣu vartante /
SA10nagvigvu:301: evam idaṃ madīyavacanaṃ pratyayasamutpannatvān niḥsvabhāvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaprasādhanaṃ pratyayabhāvānāṃ vartate /
SA10nagvigvu:303: niḥsvabhavatvāt tvadīyavacanasya śūnyatvaṃ śūnyatvāt tasya ca tena sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedha upapannam iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:307: pratiṣedhayati yadvat pratiṣedho yaṃ tathaiva syāt // NagVv_23 //
SA10nagvigvu:308: yathā nirmitakaḥ puruṣam abhyāpataṃ tu kaścid arthena vartamānaṃ pratiṣedhayet /
SA10nagvigvu:309: māyākāreṇa vā sṛṣṭo māyāpurnṣo 'nyaṃ māyāpuruṣa samabhyava tan na kasminścid arthe vartamānaṃ pratiṣedhayet /
SA10nagvigvu:310: tatra yo nirmitakaḥ puruṣaḥ pratiṣedhyate sa śūnyaḥ yaḥ pratiṣedhayati so 'pi māyāpuruṣaḥ śūnya evam eva madvacanena śūnyena sarvabhāvānāṃ svabhāvapratiṣedha upapannaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:312: śūnyatvāt tvadvacanasya sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedho nopapannam iti na tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:313: ṣaṭkoṭiko vāda uktaḥ sa evaṃ pratisiddhaḥ naiva hy evaṃ sati na sarvabhāvāntargataṃ madvacanaṃ nāpy aśūnyaṃ nāpi sarvabhāvāśūnyāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:316: atha sasvabhāvam etad vākyaṃ pūrvā hatā pratijñā te
SA10nagvigvu:317: vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavya ity [2]
SA10nagvigvu:319: na svābhāvikam etad vākyaṃ tasmān na vādahānir me /
SA10nagvigvu:320: nāsti ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ viśesahetuś ca na nigadyaḥ // NagVv_24 //
SA10nagvigvu:321: na tāvad etan mama vacanaṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt svabhāvopapannaṃ yathā pūrvam uktaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:323: yasmāc ca idam api madvacanaṃ śūnyaṃ śeṣāpi sarvabhāvāḥ śūnyās tasmān nāsti vaiṣamikatvaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:325: idaṃ vacanam aśūnyaṃ śeṣāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ śūnyā iti tato vaiṣamikatvaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:326: syān na caitad evaṃ tasmān na vaiṣamikatvaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:327: yasmāc ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ na saṃbhavati idaṃ vacanam aśūnyaṃ śeṣāḥ punaḥ sarvabhāvāḥ śūnyā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:328: tasmād asmābhir viśeṣahetur api na vaktavyaḥ anena idaṃ vacanaṃ aśūnyaṃ sarvabhāvāḥ punaḥ śūnyā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:329: tatra yad bhavatoktaṃ vādahānis te vaiṣamikatvaṃ ca viśeṣahetuś ca tvayā vaktavya iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:332: mā śabdavad ity etad asmāt te buddhir na caitad upapannaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:333: śabdena hy atra satā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasyeti / [3]
SA10nagvigvu:335: mā śabdavad iti nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto yas tvayā mamārahdhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:336: śabdena hi tac ca śabdasya vāraṇaṃ naidam eva caḥ // NagVv_25 //
SA10nagvigvu:338: yathā kaścin mā śabdaṃ karṣīr iti bruvaṃ śabdam eva karoti śabdañ ca pratiṣedhayati /
SA10nagvigvu:341: atra hi dṛṣṭānte śabdena śabdasya vyāvartanaṃ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:343: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt tad aśūnyām iti /
SA10nagvigvu:346: naiḥsvabhāvyānāṃ cen naiḥsvābhāvyena vāraṇaṃ yadi hi /
SA10nagvigvu:347: naiḥsvabhāvyanirvṛttau svabhāvyaṃ hi prasiddhaṃ syāt // NagVv_26 //
SA10nagvigvu:348: yathā mā śabdam iti śabdena śabdasya vyāvartanaṃ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:349: evaṃ yadi naiḥsvabhāvyena vacanena naiḥsvabhāvyānāṃ vyāvartanaṃ kriyate tato 'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntopapannaḥ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:350: iha tu naiḥsvabhāvyena vacanena bhāvānāṃ svabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:351: evaṃ yadi naiḥsvabhāvyena vacanena niḥsvabhāvānāṃ naiḥsvabhāvyapratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:354: śūnyatāñ ca vayaṃ bhāvānām ācakṣmahe nāśūnyatām ity adṛṣṭānta evāyam iti /
SA10nagvigvu:356: atha vā nirmitakāyāṃ yathā striyāṃ striyam ity asatgrāham /
SA10nagvigvu:357: nirmitakaḥ pratihanyāt kasyacid evaṃ bhaved ettata // NagVv_27 //
SA10nagvigvu:358: atha vā kasyacit puruṣasya nirmitakāyāṃ striyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyāyāṃ paramārthataḥ striyam ity asadgrāhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:359: syād eva tasyāṃ tenāsadgrāheṇa rāgam utpādayet /
SA10nagvigvu:360: tad yathā tathāgatena vā tacchrāvakeṇa vā nirmitako nirmitaḥ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:361: tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena vā tathāgatasrāvakādhiṣṭhānena vā tasya tam asadgrāhaṃ vinivartayet /
SA10nagvigvu:362: evam eva nirmitakopamena śūnyena vacanena nirmitakastrīsadṛśyeṣu niḥsvabhāveṣu yo 'yaṃ svabbāvagrāhaḥ sa nivartyate sa pratiṣidhyate /
SA10nagvigvu:363: tasmād ayam atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ śūnyatāprasādhanaṃ pratyupapadyamāno netaraḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:365: atha vā sādhyasamo yaṃ hetur na hi vidyate dhvaneḥ sattā /
SA10nagvigvu:366: saṃvyavahārañ ca vayaṃ nānabhyupagamya kathayāmaḥ // NagVv_28 //
SA10nagvigvu:367: mā śabdavad iti sādhyasama evāyaṃ hetuḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:373: śabdena hy atra sattā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasyeti /
SA10nagvigvu:375: api ca na vayaṃ vyavahārasatyaṃ pratyākhyāya vyavahārasatyam anabhyupagamya kathayāmaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:377: na hi vyavahārasatyam anāgamya śakyā dharmadeśanā kartuṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:380: paramārtham anāgamya nirvāṇaṃ nādhigamyata iti / [= MMK 24.18]
SA10nagvigvu:381: tasmān madvacanavat śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvānāñ ca niḥsvabhāvatvam ubhayathopapadyamānam iti //
SA10nagvigvu:384: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyo 'py evam iti mataṃ bhavet tad asad eva /
SA10nagvigvu:385: evaṃ tava pratijñā lakṣaṇato dūṣyeta na mameti / [4]
SA10nagvigvu:387: yadi kācana pratijñā tatra syān na me tat* eṣa me bhaved doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:388: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmān naivāsti me doṣaḥ // NagVv_29 //
SA10nagvigvu:389: yadi ca kācin mama pratijñā syāt tato mama pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptatvāt sa pūrvako doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:390: yathā tvayoktaṃ bhāvāḥ tathā mama syān na ca mama kācid asti pratijñā /
SA10nagvigvu:391: tasmāt sarvahhāveṣu śūnyeṣv atyantopaśānteṣu prakṛtivivikteṣu kutaḥ pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptiḥ kutaḥ pratijñālakṣaṇatāprāptikṛto doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:392: tatra yat bhavatoktaṃ pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptatvāt tavaiva doṣa iti tan nāsti /
SA10nagvigvu:395: pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvad yady upalabhya nivartayasi bhāvān
SA10nagvigvu:400: yadi kiñcid upalabheyaṃ pravarteyaṃ nivartayeyaṃ vā /
SA10nagvigvu:402: yady ahaṃ kiñcid artham upalabheyaṃ pratyakṣānumānopa + + + + hetubhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:405: ata evaṃ pravartayeyaṃ vārtham evāhaṃ kiñcin nopalabhate tasmān na pravartayāmi na nivartayāmi /
SA10nagvigvu:407: yadi pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇānām anyatamena upalabhya bhāvān vinivartayasīti /
SA10nagvigvu:408: nanu bhavatoktāni pramāṇāni na santi taiś ca pramāṇair api gamyārthā iti sa me bhavaty evānupālambha iti /
SA10nagvigvu:411: yadi ca pramāṇatas teṣāṃ teṣāṃ prasiddhir arthānām /
SA10nagvigvu:412: teṣāṃ punaḥ prasiddhiṃ brūhi kathaṃ teṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ // NagVv_31 //
SA10nagvigvu:414: yadi ca pramāṇatas teṣāṃ teṣām arthānāṃ prameyānāṃ siddhiṃ manyase yathā mānair meyānāṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:415: tathā teṣām idānīṃ pratyakṣānumānopamānāgamānāṃ caturṇāṃ pramāṇānāṃ kutaḥ prasiddhiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:416: yadi tāvan niḥpramāṇānāṃ pramāṇaṃ syān nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya /
SA10nagvigvu:417: yadi punaḥ manyase pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ pramāṇato 'rthānāṃ prasiddhir iti /
SA10nagvigvu:421: anyaiḥ yadi pramāṇaiḥ pramāṇasidhir bhavaty anavasthā syān /
SA10nagvigvu:422: nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya // NagVv_32 //
SA10nagvigvu:424: pramāṇaiḥ prameyāṇāṃ prasiddhis teṣāṃ pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir anavasthāprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:426: nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya /
SA10nagvigvu:428: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ teṣam api hi pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ siddhis teṣām anyair iti nāsty ādiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:429: āder asadbhāvāt kuto madhyaṃ kuto antaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:430: tasmāt teṣāṃ pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ nopapadyateti /
SA10nagvigvu:432: teṣām atha pramāṇair vinā prasiddhiḥ vihīyate vādaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:433: vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ // NagVv_33 //
SA10nagvigvu:434: atha manyase teṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ vinā pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ prameyānāṃ punar arthānāṃ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir iti /
SA10nagvigvu:435: evaṃ sati yas te vādaḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir arthānām iti hīyate vaiṣamikatvañ ca bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:437: arthānāṃ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ keṣāñcin neti viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:438: yena hetunā keṣāṃcid arthānāṃ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ keṣāñcin neti /
SA10nagvigvu:439: sā ca nopadiṣṭaḥ tasmād iyam api kalpanā nopapanneti /
SA10nagvigvu:440: atrāha / pramāṇāny eva mama svātmānaṃ parātmānañ ca prasādhayanti / yathoktaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:441: dyotayati svātmānaṃ yathā hutāsaḥ tathā parātmānaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:446: viṣamopanyāso 'yaṃ na hy ātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:447: na hi tasyānupalabdhiḥ dṛṣṭā tamasīva kumbhasya // NagVv_34 //
SA10nagvigvu:449: agnivat pramāṇāni svātmānañ ca prasādhayanti parātmānañ ca prasādhayantīti /
SA10nagvigvu:451: yadi hi yathā prāg evāgninā aprakāśitas tamasi kumbho nopalabhyate /
SA10nagvigvu:452: athottarakālam upalabhyate 'gninā prakāśitaḥ san evam eva yady agninā na prakāśitaḥ prāg agniḥ syād uttarakālam agneḥ prakāśanaṃ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:457: yadi ca svātmānam ayaṃ tvadvacanena prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:458: param iva na tv ātmānaṃ paridhakṣyaty api hutāśaḥ // NagVv_35 //
SA10nagvigvu:459: yadi ca tvadvacanena yathā parātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ evam eva svātmānam api prakāśayaty agnir iti /
SA10nagvigvu:463: tatra yad uktaṃ parātmānam iva svātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agnir iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:465: yadi ca svaparātmānau tvadvacanena prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:466: prachādayiṣyati tamaḥ svaparātmānau hutāśa iva // NagVv_36 //
SA10nagvigvu:467: yadi ca bhavato bhavato matena svātmāparātmānau prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:470: tatra yad uktaṃ svaparātmānau prakāśayaty agnir iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:473: nāsti tamaś ca jvalane yatra ca tiṣṭhate parātmani jvalanaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:474: kurute kathaṃ prakāśaṃ sa hi prakāśo andhakāravadhaḥ // NagVv_37 //
SA10nagvigvu:477: prakāśaś ca nāma tamasaḥ pratighātas tatra katham asya tamasaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:480: āha / yad yasmād evaṃ nāgnau tamo 'sti /
SA10nagvigvu:482: yasmād evaṃ svaparātmānau na prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:483: tena hy utpadyamānenaivāgninā tamasaḥ pratighataḥ kutaḥ tasmān nāgnau tamo 'sti /
SA10nagvigvu:485: yasmād utpadyamāna evobhayaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ svātmānaṃ parātmānañ ceti /
SA10nagvigvu:488: utpadyamāna eva prakāśayaty agnir ity asadvādaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:489: utpadyamāna eva prāpnoti tamo na hi hutāśaḥ // NagVv_38 //
SA10nagvigvu:490: ayam agnir utpadyamāna eva prakāśayati svātmānaṃ parātmānañ ceti /
SA10nagvigvu:492: kasmān na hy utpadyamāna evāgniḥ tamaḥ prāpnoti /
SA10nagvigvu:495: aprāpto 'pi jvalano yadi vā punar andhakāram upahanyāt /
SA10nagvigvu:496: sarveṣu lokadhātuṣu tamo 'yam iha saṃsthita upahanyāt // NagVv_39 //
SA10nagvigvu:497: athāpi manyase aprāpto 'py agnir andhakāram upahantīti /
SA10nagvigvu:498: nanv idānīm iha saṃsthito agniḥ sarvalokadhātustham upahaniṣyati tamaḥ tulyāyām aprāpto na caitad evaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:499: tasmād aprāpyaivāgnir andhakāram upahantīti yad iṣṭaṃ / tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:501: yadi ca svataḥ pramāṇasiddhir anapekṣya te prameyāṇi /
SA10nagvigvu:502: bhavati pramāṇasiddhiḥ nāparāpekṣā hi siddhir iti // NagVv_40 //
SA10nagvigvu:503: yadi cāgnivat svataḥ pramāṇasiddhir iti manyase /
SA10nagvigvu:504: anapekṣāpi prameyāṇi pramāṇānāṃ siddhiḥ bhaviṣyatīti kiṃ kāraṇaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:507: atrāha / yadi nāpekṣyante prameyān arthān apramāṇāni ko doṣo bhaviṣyatīti / atrocyate /
SA10nagvigvu:508: anāpeksā hi prameyān arthān yadi te pramāṇasaṃsiddhiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:509: bhavati na bhavanti kasyacid evam imāni pramāṇāni // NagVv_41 //
SA10nagvigvu:510: yadi prameyān arthān anapekṣya siddhir bhavati pramāṇānām iti /
SA10nagvigvu:511: tānīmāni pramāṇāni na kasyacit pramāṇāni bhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:514: naivedānīm anapekṣya prameyān arthān pramāṇāni bhavanti //
SA10nagvigvu:516: atha matam apekṣa siddhis teṣām iti atra bhavati ko doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:517: siddhasya na sādhanaṃ syān nāsiddho pekṣate hy anyat // NagVv_42 //
SA10nagvigvu:518: athāpi matam apekṣya prameyān arthān pramāṇānāṃ siddhir bhavatīti /
SA10nagvigvu:519: evaṃ te sati siddhasya pramāṇacatuṣṭayasya sādhanaṃ bhavatīti /
SA10nagvigvu:522: na hy asiddho devadattaḥ kañcid artham apekṣate na ca siddhasya sādhanam iṣṭaṃ kṛtasya kāraṇam anupapatter iti //
SA10nagvigvu:524: sidhyanti hi prameyāṇy apekṣya yadi sarvathā pramāṇāni /
SA10nagvigvu:528: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ na hi sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhayati /
SA10nagvigvu:533: yadi ca prameyasiddhir anapekṣaiva bhavati pramāṇāni /
SA10nagvigvu:534: kin te pramāṇasiddhyā tāni yad arthaṃ prasiddhaṃ tata // NagVv_44 //
SA10nagvigvu:535: yadi ca manyase 'napekṣyaiva pramāṇāni prameyānāṃ prasiddhir bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:536: kim idānīṃ te pramāṇasiddhyā paryanviṣṭayā kiṃ kāraṇaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:537: yad arthaṃ hi tāni pramāṇāni paryanviṣyeran /
SA10nagvigvu:538: te prameyārthā vinā pramāṇaiḥ siddhāḥ tatra kiṃ pramāṇaiḥ kṛtyaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:539: atha tu pramāṇasiddhir bhavaty apekṣyaiva te prameyāṇi /
SA10nagvigvu:540: vyatyaya evaṃ sati te dhruvaṃ pramāṇaprameyāṇāṃ // NagVv_45 //
SA10nagvigvu:541: athāpi manyase 'pekṣyaiva prameyān arthāna pramāṇani bhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:542: evaṃ te sati mā bhūt pūrvoktadoṣa iti kṛtvā /
SA10nagvigvu:543: evaṃ te sati vyatyayaḥ + + + + + yāṇāṃ bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:549: atha te pramāṇasiddhyā prameyasiddhiḥ prameyasiddhyā ca /
SA10nagvigvu:550: bhavati pramāṇasiddhiḥ nāsty ubhayasyāpi te siddhiḥ // NagVv_46 //
SA10nagvigvu:551: atha manyase pramāṇasiddhyā prameyasiddhir bhavati pramāṇāpekṣatvāt /
SA10nagvigvu:552: prameyasiddhyā ca pramāṇasiddhir bhavati prameyāpekṣatvād iti //
SA10nagvigvu:553: evaṃ saty ubhayasyāpi siddhir na .y. + + + + ṇaṃ
SA10nagvigvu:554: sidhyanti hi pramāṇair yadi prameyāṇi tāni tair evā /
SA10nagvigvu:555: sādhyāni ca prameyais tāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti // NagVv_47 //
SA10nagvigvu:556: yadi hi pramāṇaiḥ pramayāṇi sidhyanti tāni pramāṇāni tair eva prameyaiḥ sādhayitavyāni /
SA10nagvigvu:557: nanv asiddheṣu prameyeṣu kāraṇasyāsiddhatvād asiddhāni kathaṃ sādhayisyanti prameyāṇīti /
SA10nagvigvu:559: sidhyanti ca prameyaiḥ yadi pramāṇāni tāni tair eva /
SA10nagvigvu:560: sādhyāni ca prameyais tāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti // NagVv_48 //
SA10nagvigvu:561: yadi prameyaiḥ pramāṇāni sidhyanti tāni ca prameyāṇi tair eva pramāṇaiḥ sādhayitavyānīti /
SA10nagvigvu:562: nanv asiddheṣu pramāṇeṣu kāraṇasyāsiddhatvād asiddhāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti pramāṇāni /
SA10nagvigvu:563: pitra yady utpādyaḥ putro yadi tena caiva putreṇa /
SA10nagvigvu:564: utpādyaḥ sa yadi pitā vada tatrotpādayati kaḥ kaṃ // NagVv_49 //
SA10nagvigvu:566: pitrā putra utpādanīyaḥ sa ca pitā putreṇotpādanīya iti /
SA10nagvigvu:569: pramāṇaiḥ prameyāni sādhayitavyāni tāny eva ca punaḥ pramāṇāni taiḥ prameyaiḥ tatredānīṃ tu katamaiḥ katamāni sādhayitavyāni /
SA10nagvigvu:571: kaś ca pitā kaḥ putraḥ tatra tvaṃ brūhi kathaṃ tāv ubhāv api ca /
SA10nagvigvu:572: pitreputralakṣaṇadharau yato nas tatra saṃdehaḥ // NagVv_50 //
SA10nagvigvu:573: tayoś ca pūrvopadiṣṭayoḥ pitāputrayoḥ vada kataraḥ putraḥ kataraḥ pitā ubhāv api tāv utpādakatvāt pitṛlakṣaṇadharau /
SA10nagvigvu:574: utpādyatvāc ca putralakṣaṇadharāv atra naḥ sandeho bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:575: kataras tatra pitā kataras tatra putra iti /
SA10nagvigvu:579: ubhayāny api hy etāni pramāṇāni tāni prameyāṇi sādhyatvāt prameyāṇīti /
SA10nagvigvu:583: naiva svataḥ prasiddhir na parasparataḥ pramāṇair vā /
SA10nagvigvu:584: bhavati na ca prameyaiḥ na cāpy akasmāt pramāṇānāṃ // NagVv_51 //
SA10nagvigvu:585: na svataḥ prasiddhiḥ pratyakṣasya tenaiva pratyakṣeṇānumānasya tenaivānumāne /
SA10nagvigvu:588: nāpi parasyāt pratyakṣasyānumānopamānāgamair anumānasya pratyakṣopamānāgamair upamānasya pratyakṣānumānāgamaiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:590: nāpi pratyakṣānumānopamānāgamād anyaiḥ pratyakṣānumānopamānāgamair yathāsvaṃ nāpi prameyaiḥ samastavyastaiḥ svaviṣayaparaviṣatāgṛhītaiḥ nāpy akasmān nāsti samuccayena /
SA10nagvigvu:591: eteṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pūrvoddiṣṭānāṃ viṃśas triṃśac catvāriśat ṣaṭviṃśatir vā tatra yad uktaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:592: pramāṇādhigamyatvāt prameyāṇāṃ bhāvānāṃ santi tu prameyā bhāvās tāni ca pramāṇāni yais tu pramāṇaiḥ prameyā bhāvāḥ santaś ca bhāvāḥ samādhigatā iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:596: kuśalaṃ janasvabhāvaṃ manyante śeṣeṣv apy eṣa viniyogaḥ / [7]
SA10nagvigvu:600: kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmāvasthavidaḥ kuśalaṃ janasvabhāvaṃ manyante /
SA10nagvigvu:602: syād ayaṃ sa kuśalaḥ svabhāvaḥ ime te kuśalā dharmā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:603: idaṃ tatkuśalavijñānam ayaṃ kuśalavijñānasvabhāva evaṃ sarveṣāṃ na caitad evaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:604: tasmād yad uktam upadiṣṭaḥ svabhāvo dharmāṇām iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:607: yadi ca pratītya kuśalaḥ svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
SA10nagvigvu:608: dharmāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ svabhāva eva kathaṃ bhavati // NagVv_53 //
SA10nagvigvu:609: yadi ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ pratītyotpadyate /
SA10nagvigvu:610: parabhāvād utpannaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ svabhāvo bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:614: evam akuśalānām akuśalādir iti / tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:616: atha na pratītya kiñcit svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
SA10nagvigvu:617: dharmāṇām evaṃ syād vāso na brahmacaryasya // NagVv_54 //
SA10nagvigvu:619: na kiñcit pratītya kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalasvabhāva utpadyate /
SA10nagvigvu:620: evam akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām akuśalaḥ avyākṛtānām avyākṛta iti /
SA10nagvigvu:621: evaṃ saty abrahmacaryavāso bhavati kiṃ kāraṇaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:622: pratītyasamutpādasya hi evaṃ sati pratyākhyānaṃ bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:624: na hy avidyamānasya pratītyasamutpādasya darśanam utpadyamānaṃ bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:627: bhagavatā yo hi bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati /
SA10nagvigvu:634: asati hi samudaye tat kuto duḥkhaṃ samudeṣyati /
SA10nagvigvu:636: asati hi duḥkhasamudaye kasya prahāṇān nirodho bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagvigvu:637: asati hi duḥkhanirodhe kasya prāptaye mārgo bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagvigvu:643: nādharmo dharmo vā satyavyavahārāś ca lokikā ni syuḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:644: nityāś ca sarvabhāvāḥ syuḥ nityatvād ahetumataḥ // NagVv_55 //
SA10nagvigvu:646: evaṃ sati pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratyācakṣaṇasya bhavataḥ ko doṣa prasajyate /
SA10nagvigvu:647: dharmo na bhavati adharmo na bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:649: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ hy etat sarvam asati pratītyasamutpāde kuto bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagvigvu:650: api ca sasvabhāvo 'pratītyasamutpanno nirhetuko nityaḥ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:651: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ nirhetukā hi bhāvā nityās tatra sa eva cābrahmacaryavāsaḥ prasajyet svasiddhāntavirodhaś ca /
SA10nagvigvu:652: kiṃ kāraṇam anityā hi bhagavatā sarve saṃskārā nirdeṣṭās te svabhāvanityatvān nityā hi bhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:653: eṣa cākuśaleṣv avyākṛteṣu nairyāṇādiṣu ca doṣas /
SA10nagvigvu:654: tasmāt sarvaṃ saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ te bhavaty evaṃ // NagVv_56 //
SA10nagvigvu:655: yaś caiṣa kuśaleṣu nirdeṣṭaḥ kalpaḥ sa evākuśaleṣu sa evāvyākṛteṣu sa evānairyāṇikaprabhṛtiṣu doṣas tasmāt sarvam idaṃ saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ saṃpadyate //
SA10nagvigvu:656: kiṃkāraṇaṃ heto hy asaty utpādasthitibhaṅgā na bhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:659: tatra yad uktaṃ kuśalādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ svabhāvasadbhāvād aśūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:662: yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ na svabhāva ity evaṃ
SA10nagvigvu:663: nāmāpi bhaved evaṃ nāma hi nirvastukaṃ nāsti / [9]
SA10nagvigvu:664: yaḥ sadbhūtaṃ nāma brūyāt sasvabhāva ity evam /
SA10nagvigvu:665: bhavatā prativaktavyo nāma brūmaś ca na vayaṃ sata // NagVv_57 //
SA10nagvigvu:666: yo nāma sadbhūtaṃ brūyāt sasvabhāva iti sa bhavatā prativaktavyaḥ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:669: na hy asadbhūtasya svabhāvasya sadbhūtaṃ nāma bhavatīti /
SA10nagvigvu:670: na punar vayaṃ nāma sadbhūtaṃ brūmas tad api hi svabhāvasyābhāvān nāma niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyaṃ śūnyatvād asadbhūtam /
SA10nagvigvu:671: tatra yad bhavatoktaṃ nāmasadbhāvāt sadbhūtaḥ svahhāvā iti / tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:674: nāmāsad iti ca yad idaṃ tat kiṃ nu sato bhavaty utāsataḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:675: yadi hi sato yady asato dvidhāpi te hīyate vādaḥ // NagVv_58 //
SA10nagvigvu:676: yac caitan nāmāsad iti tat kiṃ sataḥ asataḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:677: yadi hi satas tan nāma yady asata ubhayathāpi pratijñā hīyate /
SA10nagvigvu:680: na hīdanīṃ tad asad idānīṃ sat* athāsata /
SA10nagvigvu:681: asad iti nāma yā pratijñā asadbhūtasya nāma na bhavati astitvasvabhāva iti nāma tasmāt sadbhūtaḥ svabhāva iti / sā hīnā //
SA10nagvigvu:684: sa upālambhaḥ tasmād bhavaty ayañ cāpratijñāyāḥ // NagVv_59 //
SA10nagvigvu:685: iha cāsmābhiḥ pūrvam eva sarveṣāṃ bhāvānaṃ vistarataḥ śūnyatvam upapāditam /
SA10nagvigvu:686: tatra prāg nāmano 'pi śūnyatvam uktaṃ saṃbhavā aśūnyatvaṃ parigṛhya pravṛtto vaktuṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:687: yadi bhāvānāṃ svābhāvo na syād asvabhāva iti nāmāpīdan na syād iti /
SA10nagvigvu:689: na hi vayaṃ nāma sadbhūtam iti brūmaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:692: atha vidyate svabhāvas sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate sa tasmāt
SA10nagvigvu:693: dharmair vinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasya tad yuktam upadeṣṭuṃ / [10]
SA10nagvigvu:694: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyatat iti idam /
SA10nagvigvu:695: āśaṅkitaṃ yad uktaṃ bhavaty anāśaṅkitaṃ tac ca // NagVv_60 //
SA10nagvigvu:696: na hi vayaṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ pratiṣedhayāmaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:697: dharmavinirmuktasya vā kasyacid arthasya svabhāvam abhyupagacchāmaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:698: nanv evaṃ sati ya upālambho bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:699: yadi dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ kasya khalv idānīm anyasyārthasya dharmavinirmuktasya svabhāvo bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:704: sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ity ayaṃ yasmāt /
SA10nagvigvu:705: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho 'yaṃ mataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt / [11] ity
SA10nagvigvu:707: sata eva pratiṣedho yadi śūnyatvaṃ nanv apratisiddham idam /
SA10nagvigvu:708: pratiṣedhayate hi hhavān bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ // NagVv_61 //
SA10nagvigvu:715: pratiṣedhayase atha tvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ tac ca nāsti śūnyatvam /
SA10nagvigvu:716: pratiṣedhaḥ sata iti te nanv eṣa vihīyate vādaḥ // NagVv_62 //
SA10nagvigvu:718: sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ nāsti tac ca śūnyatvam /
SA10nagvigvu:719: yā tarhi te pratijñā sataḥ pratiṣedho bhavati nāsata iti sā hīnā //
SA10nagvigvu:722: pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhyam asti na ca kiñcit /
SA10nagvigvu:723: tasmāt pratiṣedhayasīty adhilaya eva tvayā kriyate // NagVv_63 //
SA10nagvigvu:724: evam api tu kṛtvā yady ahaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhayāmi tato yuktam eva vaktuṃ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:725: na caivahaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhayāmi tasmān na kiñcit pratiṣedhavyam asti /
SA10nagvigvu:726: tasmāt śūnyeṣu sarvabhāveṣv avidyamāne pratiṣedhye pratiṣedhayasīty eṣa tvayātra sadbhūto 'dhilayaḥ kriyata iti //
SA10nagvigvu:728: atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kin nu pratiṣidhyate tvayānena
SA10nagvigvu:729: vacanena rte vacanāt pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyate hy asataḥ // [12]
SA10nagvigvu:731: yac cāhaṃ te vacanād asataḥ pratiṣedhavacanasiddhir iti /
SA10nagvigvu:732: atra jñāpayate vāg asad iti tan na pratinihanti // NagVv_64 //
SA10nagvigvu:735: sate 'pi vacanād asataḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pratisiddhaḥ tatra kin niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ iti /
SA10nagvigvu:737: atra brūmaḥ niḥsvabhāvā iti etat khalu vacanaṃ na niḥsvabhāvān sarvabhāvān karoti /
SA10nagvigvu:738: kintv asata svabhāva bhāvānām asata svabhāvānām iti jñāpayati /
SA10nagvigvu:739: tatra kaścit brūyād avidyamāhagṛhe devadattas tam asti gṛhe devadatta iti /
SA10nagvigvu:742: kintu jñāpayati kevalam asadbhāvaṃ gṛhe devadattasyeti //
SA10nagvigvu:743: tadvā nāsti svabhāvo bhāvānām ity etadvacanaṃ na svabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ karoti /
SA10nagvigvu:745: tatra yad bhavatoktaṃ kim asati svabhāve nāsti svabhāva ity etadvacanaṃ karoti /
SA10nagvigvu:751: evaṃ mithyāgrāhaḥ syāt te prasidhyate hy asataḥ / [13]
SA10nagvigvu:752: yat punar bhavato mṛgātṛṣṇāyām ity atra brūmaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:753: mṛgatṛṣṇādṛṣṭānte yaḥ punar uktaṃ tvayā mahāṃś carcaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:754: tatrāpi nirṇayaṃ śṛṇu yathā sa dṛṣṭānta upapannaḥ // NagVv_65 //
SA10nagvigvu:755: ya eva tvayā mṛgatṛṣṇādṛṣṭānte mahāṃś carca uktaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:756: tatrāpi tayā nirṇayaḥ sa śrūyatāṃ upapanna eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:757: sa yadi svabhāvataḥ syād bhāvo na syāt pratītya samudbhūtaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:758: yaś ca pratītya hhavati grāho nanu śūnyatā saiva // NagVv_66 //
SA10nagvigvu:759: yadi ca mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ sa yathājalagrāhaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:761_0: yato mṛgatṛṣṇāñ ca pratītya viparītañ ca darśanaṃ pratītya yoniśomanaskārañ ca pratītya
SA10nagvigvu:761_1: prādurbhūto ataḥ pratītyasamutpannaḥ yataś ca pratītyasamutpanno 'taḥ svabhāvataḥ śūnya eva /
SA10nagvigvu:765: yadi ca svabhāvataḥ syād grāhaḥ kas taṃ vinivartayed grāham /
SA10nagvigvu:766: śeṣeṣv apy eṣa vidhiḥ tasmād eṣo 'nupālambhaḥ // NagVv_67 //
SA10nagvigvu:767: yadi ca mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ jalagrāhaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:770: tathāgner uṣṇatvam apāṃ dravatvam ākāśasya niravavaraṇatvaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:773: yadā caitad evaṃ śeṣeṣv api dharmeṣv eṣa kramaḥ pratyavagantavyaḥ grāhyapravṛttiṣu pañcasu /
SA10nagvigvu:774: tatra yad bhavato + + + + pād aśūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:777: hetoś ca te na siddhir naiḥsvabbāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ
SA10nagvigvu:778: nirhetukasya siddhir na copapannāsya te 'rthasya [l7] iti //
SA10nagvigvu:780: etena hetvabhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvam eva sa samatvāt /
SA10nagvigvu:782: etenaiva cedānīṃ carcena pūrvoktena hetvabhāvo 'pi pratyavagantavyaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:783: ya eva hi carcaḥ pūrvasmin hetāv uktaḥ ṣaṭkapratiṣe + + + + + + hāpi carcayitavyaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:786: pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyam ily anupapannaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:787: paścāc cānupapanno yugapac ca yataḥ svabhāvo 'sana // [20]
SA10nagvigvu:789: yat traikālye hetuḥ pratyuktaṃ pūrvam eva sa samatvāt /
SA10nagvigvu:791: sa eṣa hetuḥ traikālye pratiṣedhavācī sa tūktottaraḥ pratyavamantaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:793: yathā hi pratiṣedhas traikālye nopapady.e + + + + + + pratiṣedhapratiṣedhe 'pi /
SA10nagvigvu:794: tasmāt pratiṣedhapratiṣedhye 'sati bhavān manyate pratiṣedhaḥ pratisiddha iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:795: yataś caiṣa trikālapratiṣedhavācī hetur eṣa eva śūnyatāvādināṃ prāptaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedhakatvān na bhavataḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:797: pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhyam asti na ca kiñcit
SA10nagvigvu:798: tasmāt pratiṣedhayasīty adhilaya eṣa tvayā kriyata [63] iti //
SA10nagvigvu:800: atha manyase triṣv api kāleṣu + + + + + + + dṛṣṭaḥ pūrvakālīno 'pi hetuḥ uttarakālīno 'pi /
SA10nagvigvu:804: yathā śiṣyācāryasya yugapatkālīnaḥ yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśasyeti //
SA10nagvigvu:806: na caitad eva yuktā hy etasmiṃ traye pūrvadoṣaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:807: api ca punaḥ yady evaṃ kamaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:812: prabhavati ca śūnyateyaṃ yasya prabhavanti tasya sarvārthāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:813: prabhavati na tasya kinna prabhavati śūnyatā yasyeti // NagVv_70 //
SA10nagvigvu:814: yasya śūnyateyaṃ prabhavati tasya sarvārthā laukikalokottarāḥ prabhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:816: yasya hi śūnyatā prabhavati tasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ prabhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:817: yasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ prabhavati tasya catvāry āryasatyāni prabhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:822: yasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ prabhavanti tasya dharmo dharmahetur dharmaphalañ ca prabhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:824: tasya kleśaḥ kleśasamudayaḥ kleśavastūni ca prabhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:825: yasyaitat sarvaṃ bhavati pūrvoktaṃ tasya sugatiṃ durgatiṃ vyavasthā + + + + + + + gatidurgatigamanaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:827: sugatidurgatigamanavyatikramaṇaṃ sugatidurgativyatikramopāyaḥ sarvasaṃvyavahārāś ca lokikāḥ svayam adhigantavyāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:828: anayā diśā kiñcit śakyaṃ vacanopadeṣṭam iti /
SA10nagvigvu:832: anekārthāṃ nijagāda praṇamāmi tam apratimaṃ tu buddhim iti //
SA10nagvigvu:834: // likhitam idaṃ śrīdhramakirtinā sarvasatvahetoḥ yathālabdham iti //
